item.text: When it was decided we would sail to Italy, they handed over Paul and some other prisoners to a centurion of the Augustan Cohort named Julius.

We <st data-num="1910">went on board</st><n id="1" /> a <st data-num="4143" class="">ship</st> from <st data-num="98" class="">Adramyttium</st><n id="2" /> that was <st data-num="3195" class="">about</st> to <st data-num="4126" class="">sail</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> various <st data-num="5117" class="">ports</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2596">along</st> the coast of the province of <st data-num="773" class="">Asia</st><n id="4" /> and <st data-num="321">put out to sea</st>,<n id="5" /> <st data-num="4862">accompanied by</st> <st data-num="708" class="">Aristarchus</st>, a <st data-num="3110" class="">Macedonian</st><n id="6" /> from <st data-num="2331" class="">Thessalonica</st>.<n id="7" />

<st data-num="2087" class="">The next day</st> we <st data-num="2609" class="">put in</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">at</st> <st data-num="4605" class="">Sidon</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="5037" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2457" class="">Julius</st>, <st data-num="5530" class="">treating</st> <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> <st data-num="5364" class="">kindly</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2010" class="">allowed</st> him <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4198" class="">go</st> to his <st data-num="5384" class="">friends</st> so they could <st data-num="1958" class="">provide</st> him with what he <st data-num="5177" class="">needed</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="2547">From there</st> we <st data-num="321">put out to sea</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="5284">sailed under the lee</st><n id="2" /> of <st data-num="2954" class="">Cyprus</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">because</st> the <st data-num="417" class="">winds</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="1727" class="">against</st> us.

After we had <st data-num="1277">sailed across</st> the <st data-num="3989" class="">open sea</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2596" class="">off</st> <st data-num="2791" class="">Cilicia</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3828" class="">Pamphylia</st>,<n id="2" /> we <st data-num="2718" class="">put in</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">at</st> <st data-num="3460" class="">Myra</st><n id="4" /> in <st data-num="3073" class="">Lycia</st>.<n id="5" />

<st data-num="2546" class="">There</st> the <st data-num="1543" class="">centurion</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st><n id="2" /> a <st data-num="4143" class="">ship</st> from <st data-num="222" class="">Alexandria</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="4126" class="">sailing</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> <st data-num="2482" class="">Italy</st>, and he <st data-num="1688" class="">put</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="1688" class="">aboard</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>.

We <st data-num="1020">sailed slowly</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">for</st> <st data-num="2425" class="">many</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">arrived</st> with <st data-num="3433" class="">difficulty</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">off</st> <st data-num="2834" class="">Cnidus</st>.<n id="2" /> Because the <st data-num="417" class="">wind</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">prevented</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> from <st data-num="4330">going any farther</st>,<n id="3" /> we <st data-num="5284" class="">sailed under the lee</st><n id="4" /> of <st data-num="2914" class="">Crete</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">off</st> <st data-num="4534" class="">Salmone</st>.<n id="5" />
With difficulty we sailed along the coast of Crete and came to a place called Fair Havens that was near the town of Lasea.
Since considerable time had passed and the voyage was now dangerous because the fast was already over, Paul advised them,

“<st data-num="435" class="">Men</st>, I can <st data-num="2334" class="">see</st> the <st data-num="4144" class="">voyage</st> is <st data-num="3195" class="">going</st> to <st data-num="1510" class="">end</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3326" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5196" class="">disaster</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">great</st> <st data-num="2209" class="">loss</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3441">only</st> of the <st data-num="5413" class="">cargo</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="4143" class="">ship</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> of <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="5590" class="">lives</st>.”<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> the <st data-num="1543" class="">centurion</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3982" class="">was</st> <st data-num="3123" class="">more</st> <st data-num="3982" class="">convinced</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="2942" class="">captain</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="3490">ship’s owner</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">than</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> what <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>.<n id="4" />

Because the <st data-num="3040" class="">harbor</st> <st data-num="5225" class="">was</st> <st data-num="428">not suitable</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3915" class="">spend the winter</st> in, the <st data-num="4183">majority</st> <st data-num="1012" class="">decided</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="5087" class="">put out</st> to <st data-num="321" class="">sea</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1564" class="">from there</st>. They hoped that<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1513" class="">somehow</st> they <st data-num="1410" class="">could</st> <st data-num="2658" class="">reach</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="5405" class="">Phoenix</st>,<n id="5" /> a <st data-num="3040" class="">harbor</st> of <st data-num="2914" class="">Crete</st> <st data-num="991" class="">facing</st><n id="6" /> <st data-num="3047" class="">southwest</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5566" class="">northwest</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3914">spend the winter</st> there.

When a <st data-num="5285" class="">gentle</st> <st data-num="3558" class="">south wind</st> <st data-num="5285" class="">sprang up</st>, they <st data-num="1380" class="">thought</st><n id="1" /> they could <st data-num="2902">carry out</st><n id="2" /> their <st data-num="4286" class="">purpose</st>, so they <st data-num="142">weighed anchor</st><n id="3" /> and <st data-num="3881" class="">sailed</st> <st data-num="788" class="">close</st> <st data-num="3881" class="">along</st> the coast<n id="4" /> of <st data-num="2914" class="">Crete</st>.

<st data-num="3756" class="">Not</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">long</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">after</st> this, a <st data-num="5189" class="">hurricane-force</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="417" class="">wind</st> <st data-num="2564" class="">called</st> the <st data-num="2148" class="">northeaster</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="906">blew down</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="846" class="">island</st>.<n id="3" />

When the <st data-num="4143" class="">ship</st> was <st data-num="4884" class="">caught</st> in it<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1410" class="">could</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="503" class="">head</st> into<n id="2" /> the <st data-num="417" class="">wind</st>, we <st data-num="1929">gave way</st> to it and were <st data-num="5342" class="">driven<n id="3" /> along</st>.

As we <st data-num="5295" class="">ran under the lee</st> of<n id="1" /> a <st data-num="3519">small island</st> <st data-num="2564" class="">called</st> <st data-num="2802" class="">Cauda</st>,<n id="2" /> we were <st data-num="2480" class="">able</st> <st data-num="3433" class="">with difficulty</st> to <st data-num="4031" class="">get</st> the ship’s <st data-num="4627" class="">boat</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="4031" class="">under control</st>.

After the crew<n id="1" /> had <st data-num="142" class="">hoisted</st> <st data-num="3739">it</st> aboard,<n id="2" /> they <st data-num="5530" class="">used</st> <st data-num="996" class="">supports</st><n id="3" /> to <st data-num="5269" class="">undergird</st> the <st data-num="4143" class="">ship</st>. <st data-num="5399" class="">Fearing</st> they would <st data-num="1601" class="">run aground</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="4950" class="">Syrtis</st>,<n id="5" /> they <st data-num="5465" class="">lowered</st> the <st data-num="4632">sea anchor</st>,<n id="6" /> <st data-num="3779" class="">thus</st> letting themselves be <st data-num="5342">driven along</st>.

The <st data-num="1836" class="">next day</st>, because <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> were <st data-num="4971" class="">violently</st> <st data-num="5492" class="">battered by the storm</st>,<n id="1" /> they began <st data-num="4160" class="">throwing</st> the cargo <st data-num="1546" class="">overboard</st>,<n id="2" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> on the <st data-num="5154">third</st> day they <st data-num="4496" class="">threw</st> the <st data-num="4143">ship’s</st> <st data-num="4631" class="">gear</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4496" class="">overboard</st> with <st data-num="849">their own hands</st>.
When neither sun nor stars appeared for many days and a violent storm continued to batter us, we finally abandoned all hope of being saved.
Since many of them had no desire to eat, Paul stood up among them and said, “Men, you should have listened to me and not put out to sea from Crete, thus avoiding this damage and loss.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st> I <st data-num="3867" class="">advise</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> to <st data-num="2114" class="">keep up</st> your <st data-num="2114" class="">courage</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> there will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="3762" class="">no</st> <st data-num="580" class="">loss</st> of <st data-num="5590" class="">life</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">among</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="4133" class="">but only</st> the <st data-num="4143" class="">ship</st> will be lost.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">last</st> <st data-num="3571" class="">night</st> an <st data-num="32" class="">angel</st> of the <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> to <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> <st data-num="1473">I</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">belong</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> I <st data-num="3000" class="">serve</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3936" class="">came</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st><n id="3" />

and <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>,<n id="1" /> ‘Do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="5399" class="">afraid</st>, <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st>! <st data-num="4771" class="">You</st> <st data-num="1163" class="">must</st> <st data-num="3936">stand before</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2541" class="">Caesar</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> has <st data-num="5483">graciously granted</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the safety<n id="4" /> of <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> who are <st data-num="4126" class="">sailing</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.’

<st data-num="1352" class="">Therefore</st> <st data-num="2114" class="">keep up</st> your <st data-num="2114">courage</st>, <st data-num="435" class="">men</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> I <st data-num="4100">have faith in</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> it will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="2596 5158">just as</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> have been <st data-num="2980" class="">told</st>.
But we must run aground on some island.”
When the fourteenth night had come, while we were being driven across the Adriatic Sea, about midnight the sailors suspected they were approaching some land.

They took <st data-num="1001" class="">soundings</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> the water was <st data-num="1501" class="">twenty</st> <st data-num="3712" class="">fathoms</st><n id="2" /> deep; when they had <st data-num="1339" class="">sailed</st> a <st data-num="1024" class="">little</st> <st data-num="1339" class="">farther</st><n id="3" /> they took <st data-num="1001" class="">soundings</st> <st data-num="3825" class="">again</st> and <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> it was <st data-num="1178" class="">fifteen</st> <st data-num="3712" class="">fathoms</st><n id="4" /> deep.

Because they were <st data-num="5399" class="">afraid</st><n id="1" /> that we would <st data-num="1601">run aground</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="5138" class="">rocky</st> <st data-num="5117" class="">coast</st>,<n id="2" /> they <st data-num="45" class="">threw out</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="5064" class="">four</st> <st data-num="45" class="">anchors</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="4403" class="">stern</st> and <st data-num="2172" class="">wished</st><n id="4" /> for <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> to <st data-num="1096" class="">appear</st>.<n id="5" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">Then</st> when the <st data-num="3492" class="">sailors</st> <st data-num="2212" class="">tried</st> to <st data-num="5343" class="">escape</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="4143" class="">ship</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> were <st data-num="5465" class="">lowering</st> the ship’s <st data-num="4627" class="">boat</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="2281" class="">sea</st>, <st data-num="4392" class="">pretending</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="5613" class="">that</st> they were <st data-num="3195" class="">going</st> to <st data-num="1614" class="">put out</st> <st data-num="45" class="">anchors</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="4408" class="">bow</st>,

<st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to the <st data-num="1543" class="">centurion</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="4757" class="">soldiers</st>, “<st data-num="1437 3361">Unless</st> <st data-num="3778">these men</st> <st data-num="3306" class="">stay</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="4143" class="">ship</st>, <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3756 1410">cannot</st> be <st data-num="4982" class="">saved</st>.”
Then the soldiers cut the ropes of the ship’s boat and let it drift away.
As day was about to dawn, Paul urged them all to take some food, saying, “Today is the fourteenth day you have been in suspense and have gone without food; you have eaten nothing.

<st data-num="1352" class="">Therefore</st> I <st data-num="3870" class="">urge</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> to <st data-num="3335" class="">take</st> some <st data-num="5160" class="">food</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> is <st data-num="5225" class="">important</st><n id="1" /> for <st data-num="5212" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4991" class="">survival</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3762">not one</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> will <st data-num="622" class="">lose</st> a <st data-num="2359" class="">hair</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> his <st data-num="2776" class="">head</st>.”

After he <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st>, Paul<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2983" class="">took</st> <st data-num="740" class="">bread</st><n id="2" /> and <st data-num="2168">gave thanks</st> to <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1799">in front of</st> them <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2806" class="">broke</st><n id="4" /> it, and <st data-num="757">began</st> to <st data-num="2068" class="">eat</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> of them <st data-num="1096" class="">were</st> <st data-num="2115" class="">encouraged</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4355" class="">took</st> <st data-num="5160" class="">food</st> themselves.

(We <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> in <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="1250 1440 1803">276</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="5590" class="">persons</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="4143">ship</st>.)<n id="2" />
When they had eaten enough to be satisfied, they lightened the ship by throwing the wheat into the sea.
When day came, they did not recognize the land, but they noticed a bay with a beach, where they decided to run the ship aground if they could.

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st> they <st data-num="4014" class="">slipped</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="45" class="">anchors</st><n id="2" /> and <st data-num="1439" class="">left</st> them <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2281" class="">sea</st>, at the <st data-num="260" class="">same time</st> <st data-num="447" class="">loosening</st> the <st data-num="2202" class="">linkage</st><n id="3" /> that bound the <st data-num="4079">steering oars</st><n id="4" /> together. <st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st> they <st data-num="1869" class="">hoisted</st><n id="5" /> the <st data-num="736" class="">foresail</st><n id="6" /> to the <st data-num="4154" class="">wind</st> and <st data-num="2722" class="">steered</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">toward</st><n id="7" /> the <st data-num="123" class="">beach</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> they <st data-num="4045" class="">encountered</st> a <st data-num="5117" class="">patch</st> of <st data-num="1337" class="">crosscurrents</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="2027" class="">ran</st> the <st data-num="3491" class="">ship</st> <st data-num="2027" class="">aground</st>; the <st data-num="4408" class="">bow</st> <st data-num="2043">stuck fast</st> and could <st data-num="761">not be moved</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> the <st data-num="4403" class="">stern</st> was being <st data-num="3089">broken up</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="970" class="">force</st><n id="2" /> of the <st data-num="2949" class="">waves</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">Now</st> the <st data-num="4757" class="">soldiers’</st> <st data-num="1012" class="">plan</st> <st data-num="1096">was</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="615" class="">kill</st> the <st data-num="1202" class="">prisoners</st><n id="1" /> so that <st data-num="3361">none</st> of <st data-num="5100" class="">them</st> would <st data-num="1309">escape</st> by <st data-num="1579">swimming away</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> the <st data-num="1543" class="">centurion</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1014" class="">wanting</st> to <st data-num="1295" class="">save</st> <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul’s</st> life,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2967" class="">prevented</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> from carrying out their <st data-num="1013" class="">plan</st>. He <st data-num="2753" class="">ordered</st> those who <st data-num="1410" class="">could</st> <st data-num="2860" class="">swim</st> to <st data-num="641">jump overboard</st> <st data-num="4413" class="">first</st> and <st data-num="1826" class="">get</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1093" class="">land</st>,<n id="3" />
and the rest were to follow, some on planks and some on pieces of the ship. And in this way all were brought safely to land.
